description.message: Dar una ambientación alrededor de la imagen con un simple clic en el botón.
description.description: Dar una ambientación alrededor de la imagen con un simple clic en el botón.

descontextmenus.message: Mostrar el menú contextual de Ambient Aurea.
descontextmenus.description: Ver el menú contextual de Ambient Aurea

donatepromotext.message: ¡Si pudiese hacernos una donación, sin importar la cantidad, se lo agradeceríamos mucho!
donatepromotext.description: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

desicon.message: Ocultar icono de acciones de la barra
desicon.description: Ocultar icono de acciones de la barra

desambilight.message: Mostrar el efecto de la iluminación ambiental en esta imagen.
desambilight.description: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current image

desambilight4color.message: Elija 4 colores para mostrar alrededor de la imagen:
desambilight4color.description: Elija 4 colores para mostrarlos alrededor de la imagen:

desambilightvarcolor.message: Extraer los colores de la imagen.
desambilightvarcolor.description: Extraer los colores de la imagen.

desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Los valores positivos aumentan el tamaño de la sombra, los valores negativos lo disminuyen.
desambilightrangespreadradius.description: Los valores positivos aumentan el tamaño de la sombra, los valores negativos la disminuyen.

desambilightrangeblurradius.message: Lower values will sharpen the shadow, higher values will make them more blurred.
desambilightrangeblurradius.description: Lower values will sharpen the shadow, higher values will make them more blurred.

descolor.message: El color del fondo está fuera del marco
descolor.description: The background color of the outside of the frame

desopacity.message: Seleccione el nivel de opacidad fuera del marco.
desopacity.description: Choose the opacity level outside of the frame.

dessharebar.message: Esto permite mostrar la barra de compartir en la imagen actual.
dessharebar.description: This shows the share bar for the current image.

descount.message: Esto muestra en la parte inferior derecha el número total de imágenes en la galería.
descount.description: This show right below the total number of images found in the gallery.

desslideshow.message: Esto añade un botón adicional en la parte superior de la ventana de reproducción para que pueda iniciar la presentación de esta galería.
desslideshow.description: Esto añade un botón adicional en la parte superior de la ventana de reproducción para que pueda iniciar la presentación de esta galería.

ratetitle.message: Por favor, valore y revise mi extensión
ratetitle.description: Por favor, valore y revise mi extensión

ratedes.message: ¡Haga que todos sepan acerca de esta gran extensión!
ratedes.description: ¡Haga que todos sepan acerca de esta gran extensión!

tellothers.message: Asegúrese de que su opinión cuenta
tellothers.description: Asegúrese de que su opinión cuenta

desambientaurea.message: Where your photos come to life is also available for your computer.
desambientaurea.description: Where your photos come to life is also available for your computer.

titeldownloadaaupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.
titeldownloadaaupgrade.description: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.
titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.description: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.
titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.description: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.message: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.
titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.description: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.

titeldownloadupgradezoom.message: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.
titeldownloadupgradezoom.description: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.

titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.message: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.
titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.description: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page
desrememberpage.description: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!
longdonatetext.description: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.
enjoyshare.description: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sincronice los ajustes de la extensión con el otro navegador.
titelsyncbrowser.description: Sincronice los ajustes de la extensión con el otro navegador.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
titeldownloadupgrade.description: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: No volver a mostrar este recordatorio al abrir las opciones
showremember.description: Do not show this reminder page again when I open the options page

skipremember.message: Omitir esto y abrir la página de opciones
skipremember.description: Omitir esto y abrir la página de opciones

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Ambient Aurea Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Ambient Aurea extension in your web browser.
welcomebasictext.description: Welcome on the Ambient Aurea Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Ambient Aurea extension in your web browser.
